Vin skazav, "Miy Lord, kistky povernulysya krykhki u moyomu tili, ta moye volossya aflame z sirym. Tomu shcho ya blahayu Vas, moho Lorda, I nikoly ne rozpachu
mene turbuye moyikh zalezhnykh lyudynu piznishe meni, ta moya druzhyna ye sterylʹnym. Harantuyte meni, vid Vas, spadkoyemetsʹ
Dozvolyayutʹ yomu miy spadkoyemetsʹ ta spadkoyemetsʹ Jacob klan, ta roblyatʹ yomu, moyomu Lordu, pryynyatnomu
O Zachariah, my dayemo vam harnu novynu; khlopchyk chyya nazva bude Dzhon (Yahya). My nikoly utvoreni budʹ khto ne lyubymo yoho ranishe
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord, ya budu maty syna nezvazhayuchy na miy sterility druzhyny, ta nezvazhayuchy na moyu staristʹ
Vin skazav, 'Takym "chynom skazav vashoho Lorda: `it ye lehkyy dlya Mene shchob zrobyty. YA utvoryv vas pered shcho, ta vy nichoho
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord, dayutʹ meni znak." Vin skazav, "Vash znak shcho vy ne budete rozmovlyaty z lyudʹmy dlya trʹokh poslidovnykh nochi
